Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius) and lightly grease a 9x5-inch loaf pan.

Mix bananas and vinegar; set aside. Cream sugar and butter, add eggs, then combine with banana mixture. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt, then blend into wet ingredients. Stir in walnuts and chocolate chips and spread into a greased loaf pan.
You can make homemade chocolate gravy that is a sweet sauce using flour, fat, cocoa powder, and sugar. It's often served for breakfast over biscuits in the Appalachian Mountains.
